Authentication type of the connection target

credentials.description: Account key object for connection credential.

allowProjectManagement.description: Specifies whether this resource support project management as child resources, used as containers for access management, data isolation and cost in AI Foundry.

amlWorkspace.description: The user owned AML account properties.

apiProperties.description: The api properties for special APIs.

associatedProjects.description: Specifies the projects, by project name, that are associated with this resource.

customSubDomainName.description: Optional subdomain name used for token-based authentication.

defaultProject.description: Specifies the project, by project name, that is targeted when data plane endpoints are called without a project parameter.

dynamicThrottlingEnabled.description: The flag to enable dynamic throttling.

encryption.description: The encryption properties for this resource.

locations.description: The multiregion settings of Cognitive Services account.

networkAcls.description: A collection of rules governing the accessibility from specific network locations.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not public endpoint access is allowed for this account.

storedCompletionsDisabled.description: The flag to disable stored completions.

userOwnedStorage.description: The storage accounts for this resource.

authType.description: Authentication type of the connection target

credentials.description: Api key object for connection credential.

aadClientId.description: (Metrics Advisor Only) The Azure AD Client Id (Application Id).

aadTenantId.description: (Metrics Advisor Only) The Azure AD Tenant Id.

eventHubConnectionString.description: (Personalization Only) The flag to enable statistics of Bing Search.

qnaAzureSearchEndpointId.description: (QnAMaker Only) The Azure Search endpoint id of QnAMaker.

qnaAzureSearchEndpointKey.description: (QnAMaker Only) The Azure Search endpoint key of QnAMaker.

qnaRuntimeEndpoint.description: (QnAMaker Only) The runtime endpoint of QnAMaker.

statisticsEnabled.description: (Bing Search Only) The flag to enable statistics of Bing Search.

storageAccountConnectionString.description: (Personalization Only) The storage account connection string.

superUser.description: (Metrics Advisor Only) The super user of Metrics Advisor.

websiteName.description: (Metrics Advisor Only) The website name of Metrics Advisor.

customerSubnet.description: Customer subnet info to help set up this capability host.

storageConnections.description: List of connection names from those available in the account or project to be used as a storage resource.

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

threadStorageConnections.description: List of connection names from those available in the account or project to be used for Thread storage.

vectorStoreConnections.description: List of connection names from those available in the account or project to be used for vector database (e.g. CosmosDB).

accountId.description: The Azure resource id of the account.

clientId.description: Client id in the format of UUID

refreshToken.description:
Required by GoogleBigQuery, GoogleAdWords, Hubspot, QuickBooks, Square, Xero, Zoho
where user needs to get RefreshToken offline

tenantId.description: Required by QuickBooks and Xero connection categories

username.description:
Concur, ServiceNow auth server AccessToken grant type is 'Password'
which requires UsernamePassword

error.description: Provides the error message if the connection fails

metadata.description: Store user metadata for this connection

peRequirement.description: Specifies how private endpoints are used with this connection: 'Required', 'NotRequired', or 'NotApplicable'.

peStatus.description: Specifies the status of private endpoints for this connection: 'Inactive', 'Active', or 'NotApplicable'.

target.description: The connection URL to be used.

securityToken.description: Optional, required by connections like SalesForce for extra security in addition to UsernamePassword

source.description: Content source to apply the Content Filters.

authType.description: Authentication type of the connection target

source.description: Content source to apply the Content Filters.

state.description: Defender for AI state on the AI resource.

priority.description: The priority of this capacity setting.

source.description: Optional. Deployment model source ARM resource ID.

sourceAccount.description: Optional. Source of the model, another Microsoft.CognitiveServices accounts ARM resource ID.

version.description: Optional. Deployment model version. If version is not specified, a default version will be assigned. The default version is different for different models and might change when there is new version available for a model. Default version for a model could be found from list models API.

model.description: Properties of Cognitive Services account deployment model.

scaleSettings.description: Properties of Cognitive Services account deployment model. (Deprecated, please use Deployment.sku instead.)

spilloverDeploymentName.description: Specifies the deployment name that should serve requests when the request would have otherwise been throttled due to reaching current deployment throughput limit.

keySource.description: Enumerates the possible value of keySource for Encryption
Enumerates the possible value of keySource for Encryption

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}

value.description: An IPv4 address range in CIDR notation, such as '124.56.78.91' (simple IP address) or '124.56.78.0/24' (all addresses that start with 124.56.78).

keyName.description: Name of the Key from KeyVault

keyVersion.description: Version of the Key from KeyVault

authType.description: Authentication type of the connection target

scenario.description: Specifies what features in AI Foundry network injection applies to. Currently only supports 'agent' for agent scenarios. 'none' means no network injection.

subnetArmId.description: Specify the subnet for which your Agent Client is injected into.

useMicrosoftManagedNetwork.description: Boolean to enable Microsoft Managed Network for subnet delegation

defaultAction.description: The default action when no rule from ipRules and from virtualNetworkRules match. This is only used after the bypass property has been evaluated.

ipRules.description: The list of IP address rules.

virtualNetworkRules.description: The list of virtual network rules.

authType.description: Authentication type of the connection target
Authentication type of the connection target

credentials.description:
ClientId and ClientSecret are required. Other properties are optional
depending on each OAuth2 provider's implementation.

authType.description: Authentication type of the connection target

groupIds.description: The private link resource group ids.

privateEndpoint.description: The resource of private end point.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

actionsRequired.description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

description.description: The reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

status.description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

description.description: The description of the Cognitive Services Project.

displayName.description: The display name of the Cognitive Services Project.

tierUpgradePolicy.description: Gets the tier upgrade policy for the subscription.

isRegex.description: If the pattern is a regex pattern.

identityClientId.description: The identity client Id to access the storage.

severityThreshold.description: Level at which content is filtered.

source.description: Content source to apply the Content Filters.

customTopics.description: The list of custom rai topics.

mode.description: Rai policy mode. The enum value mapping is as below: Default = 0, Deferred=1, Blocking=2, Asynchronous_filter =3. Please use 'Asynchronous_filter' after 2025-06-01. It is the same as 'Deferred' in previous version.

createdAt.description: Creation time of the custom topic.

failedReason.description: Failed reason if the status is Failed.

lastModifiedAt.description: Last modified time of the custom topic.

sampleBlobUrl.description: Sample blob url for the custom topic.

topicId.description: The unique identifier of the custom topic.

topicName.description: The name of the custom topic.

customsubdomain.description: Maps the region to the regional custom subdomain.

value.description: A value for priority or weighted routing methods.

authType.description: Authentication type of the connection target
Authentication type of the connection target

capacity.description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

family.description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

name.description: The name of the SKU. Ex - P3. It is typically a letter+number code

size.description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

tier.description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier, but is not required on a PUT.

authType.description: Authentication type of the connection target

identityClientId.description: Identity Client id of a AML account resource.

resourceId.description: Full resource id of a AML account resource.
Full resource id of a Microsoft.Storage resource.

id.description: Full resource id of a vnet subnet, such as '/subscriptions/subid/resourceGroups/rg1/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/test-vnet/subnets/subnet1'.

ignoreMissingVnetServiceEndpoint.description: Ignore missing vnet service endpoint or not.

state.description: Gets the state of virtual network rule.
